profileText: a Senator from Ohio; born in Middletown, Ohio, August 2, 1984; graduated Middletown High School, 2003; B.A., political science and philosophy, Ohio State University, 2009; J.D., Yale Law School, 2013; United States Marine Corps, 2003-2007; served in Operation Iraqi Freedom; lawyer; venture capitalist; writer; lecturer; non-profit organization founder; elected as a Republican to the United States Senate in 2022 for the term ending January 3, 2029.

creativeWork.name: Vance, J.D. Hillbilly Elegy: A Memoir of a Family and Culture in Crisis. New York: Harper, 2016.
creativeWork.freeFormCitationText: Vance, J.D. Hillbilly Elegy: A Memoir of a Family and Culture in Crisis. New York: Harper, 2016.
